ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Money troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: true...but remember to bring a magic weapon with you
ygData.messageBody:
true...but remember to bring a magic weapon with you

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shane Bole [SMTP:shane0009@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 12:53 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Money troubles
>
> At your level, give willowisps a shot. they range from 9-11
> You can sell lightstones to merchants for almost a plat, and greater
> lightstones for almost 4, or you can sell to players for around 6pp. They
> give pretty good exp too, you should fly up pretty quick
> best place for wisps off the top of my head are:
> 1) West commons, in the area between toll booth and druid ring
> 2) the isle in Erud's Crossing. Take the boat from Qeynos -> Erudin and
> there will be a stop halfway
> 3) Qeynos Hills, at the area right after you zone from qeynos up to the
> road
>
> <LINKDEAD> [50 Enchanter] Fabno Licious (Erudite)
>
>
